mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mishu_analyze.zhaobiao_analyze_detail ( redisId,noticeUrl,title,tbAssureSum,projDq, projXs,projSum,bmStartDate,bmEndDate,bmEndTime, bmSite,kbSite,tbEndDate,tbEndTime,gsDate, province,city,county,projType,zzRank, pbMode,tbAssureEndDate,tbAssureEndTime,lyAssureSum,slProveSum, assureEndDate,assureEndTime,zgCheckDate,kbStaffAsk,fileCost, otherCost,zbName,zbContactMan,zbContactWay,dlContactMan, dlContactWay,personRequest,shebaoRequest,yejiRequest,registrationForm, projectTimeLimit,projectCompletionDate,supplementNoticeNumber,supplementNoticeReason,flowStandardFlag, money,block,analyzeDate,assureSumRemit) VALUES (#{redisId},#{noticeUrl},#{title},#{tbAssureSum},#{projDq}, #{projXs},#{projSum},#{bmStartDate},#{bmEndDate},#{bmEndTime}, #{bmSite},#{kbSite},#{tbEndDate},#{tbEndTime},#{gsDate}, #{province},#{city},#{county},#{projType},#{zzRank}, #{pbMode},#{tbAssureEndDate},#{tbAssureEndTime},#{lyAssureSum},#{slProveSum}, #{assureEndDate},#{assureEndTime},#{zgCheckDate},#{kbStaffAsk},#{fileCost}, #{otherCost},#{zbName},#{zbContactMan},#{zbContactWay},#{dlContactMan}, #{dlContactWay},#{personRequest},#{shebaoRequest},#{yejiRequest},#{registrationForm}, #{projectTimeLimit},#{projectCompletionDate},#{supplementNoticeNumber},#{supplementNoticeReason},#{flowStandardFlag}, #{money},#{block},now(),#{assureSumRemit})

INSERT INTO mishu_analyze.zhaobiao_analyze_detail ( redisId,noticeUrl,title,tbAssureSum,projDq, projXs,projSum,bmStartDate,bmEndDate,bmEndTime, bmSite,kbSite,tbEndDate,tbEndTime,gsDate, province,city,county,projType,zzRank, pbMode,tbAssureEndDate,tbAssureEndTime,lyAssureSum,slProveSum, assureEndDate,assureEndTime,zgCheckDate,kbStaffAsk,fileCost, otherCost,zbName,zbContactMan,zbContactWay,dlContactMan, dlContactWay,personRequest,shebaoRequest,yejiRequest,registrationForm, projectTimeLimit,projectCompletionDate,supplementNoticeNumber,supplementNoticeReason,flowStandardFlag, money,block,analyzeDate,assureSumRemit) VALUES
(#{b.redisId},#{b.noticeUrl},#{b.title},#{b.tbAssureSum},#{b.projDq}, #{b.projXs},#{b.projSum},#{b.bmStartDate},#{b.bmEndDate},#{b.bmEndTime}, #{b.bmSite},#{b.kbSite},#{b.tbEndDate},#{b.tbEndTime},#{b.gsDate}, #{b.province},#{b.city},#{b.county},#{b.projType},#{b.zzRank}, #{b.pbMode},#{b.tbAssureEndDate},#{b.tbAssureEndTime},#{b.lyAssureSum},#{b.slProveSum}, #{b.assureEndDate},#{b.assureEndTime},#{b.zgCheckDate},#{b.kbStaffAsk},#{b.fileCost}, #{b.otherCost},#{b.zbName},#{b.zbContactMan},#{b.zbContactWay},#{b.dlContactMan}, #{b.dlContactWay},#{b.personRequest},#{b.shebaoRequest},#{b.yejiRequest},#{b.registrationForm}, #{b.projectTimeLimit},#{b.projectCompletionDate},#{b.supplementNoticeNumber},#{b.supplementNoticeReason},#{b.flowStandardFlag}, #{b.money},#{b.block},now(),#{assureSumRemit})
mapper.select: SELECT address FROM mishu_snatch.analyze_range_bmaddr WHERE id=(SELECT baseAddrId FROM mishu_snatch.analyze_range_bmaddr_alias WHERE alias=#{address})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mishu_analyze.zhongbiao_analyze_detail ( redisId,noticeUrl,title,gsDate, projSum,projDq,projXs,pbMode,projType, oneName,oneUUid,oneOffer,oneProjDuty,oneProjDutyUUid, oneSkillDuty,oneSgy,oneAqy,oneZly,twoName, twoOffer,twoProjDuty,twoSkillDuty,twoSgy,twoAqy, twoZly,threeName,threeOffer,threeProjDuty,threeSkillDuty, threeSgy,threeAqy,threeZly,province,city, county,block,analyzeDate) VALUES (#{redisId},#{noticeUrl},#{title},#{gsDate}, #{projSum},#{projDq},#{projXs},#{pbMode},#{projType}, #{oneName},#{oneUUid},#{oneOffer},#{oneProjDuty},#{oneProjDutyUUid}, #{oneSkillDuty},#{oneSgy},#{oneAqy},#{oneZly},#{twoName}, #{twoOffer},#{twoProjDuty},#{twoSkillDuty},#{twoSgy},#{twoAqy}, #{twoZly},#{threeName},#{threeOffer},#{threeProjDuty},#{threeSkillDuty}, #{threeSgy},#{threeAqy},#{threeZly},#{province},#{city}, #{county},#{block},now())
